articles.title: Tom Cotton keeps repeating a coronavirus conspiracy theory that was already debunked
articles.description: Experts say there's no evidence the virus is man-made and it's « highly unlikely » it is the result of an accident at a lab.
articles.content:
We dont know where it originated, and we have to get to the bottom of that, Cotton said. We also know that just a few miles away from that food market is Chinas only biosafety level 4 super laboratory that researches human infectious diseases.

articles.title: Trump’s soft touch with China’s Xi worries advisers who say more is needed to combat coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: President Trump has repeatedly told advisers pushing for a harder line against China could backfire because Xi controls the government “totally” and will not work with the United States if they say anything negative about the country

articles.author: Rick Noack, Stefano Pitrelli
articles.title: Virus games are going viral as the coronavirus spreads
articles.description: As officials and experts worked to stem the global spread of the novel coronavirus, gamers have turned their attention to parallel, imaginary struggles.
articles.content:
The popularity of such games makes sense amid efforts to cope with the coronavirus and the fears it has sown, researchers and game developers said.
Games are a type of cultural expression theyre part of how we make sense of the world, said Carly A. Kocurek, … [+5092 chars]
